Download Xcode for Free

Xcode 7 beta 2Pre-release

This release includes the Xcode IDE, Swift 2 compiler, Instruments, Simulator, and latest SDKs for OS X, iOS, and watchOS.

  • Download Xcode 7 beta 2
  • Xcode 7 beta 2 Release Notes

Released: Jun 23, 2015
Build: 7A121l
SDK: iOS 9 beta 2, OS X v10.11 beta

Xcode 6.3.2

This release includes the Xcode IDE, LLVM compiler, Instruments, iOS Simulator, the latest OS X and iOS SDKs, WatchKit and the Swift 1.2 programming language.

View in the Mac App Store

Updated: May 18, 2015
Build: 6D2105
SDK: iOS 8.3, OS X v10.10

Xcode 6.4 beta 4Pre-release

This is a pre-release version of the complete Xcode developer toolset for Mac, iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch. This release requires OS X Yosemite.

  • Download Xcode 6.4 beta 4
  • Xcode 6.4 beta 4 Release Notes

Released: Jun 9, 2015
Build: 6E31c
SDK: iOS 8.4 beta 4, OS X v10.10
